meanings.definition: The act or process of shrinking.
meanings.sent1: The shrinkage of the fabric was noticeable after washing.
meanings.sent2: The shrinkage of the ice cube made it easier to fit in the glass.
meanings.sent3: The shrinkage of the sweater in the dryer turned it into a crop top.
meanings.sent4: The shrinkage of the map made it difficult to read the small print.
meanings.sent5: The shrinkage of the balloon was sudden and unexpected.

meanings.definition: The amount by which something shrinks.
meanings.sent1: She measured the shrinkage of the wool sweater after washing.
meanings.sent2: The shrinkage of the cake was evident as it cooled down.
meanings.sent3: The shrinkage of the candy bar in the sun made it easier to share.
meanings.sent4: The shrinkage of the plastic wrap caused it to cling tightly to the bowl.
meanings.sent5: The shrinkage of the rubber band was enough to hold the papers together.

meanings.definition: A decrease in size, amount, or value.
meanings.sent1: The shrinkage of the company's profits was concerning to the shareholders.
meanings.sent2: The shrinkage of the lake over the years was due to drought.
meanings.sent3: The shrinkage of the cookie made it the perfect bite-sized treat.
meanings.sent4: The shrinkage of the population in the town led to the closure of businesses.
meanings.sent5: The shrinkage of the budget meant they had to cut back on expenses.
